export var login=function login(credential){//fetch api
var loginUrl="/login?username=".concat(credential.username,"&password=").concat(credential.password);return fetch(loginUrl,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include"}).then(function(response){if(response.status<200||response.status>=300){throw Error("Fail to log in");}});};export var signup=function signup(data){var signupUrl="/signup";return fetch(signupUrl,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(data)}).then(function(response){if(response.status<200||response.status>=300){throw Error("Fail to sign up");}});};export var getMenus=function getMenus(restId){return fetch("/restaurant/".concat(restId,"/menu")).then(function(response){if(response.status<200||response.status>=300){throw Error("Fail to get menus");}return response.json();});};export var getRestaurants=function getRestaurants(){return fetch("/restaurants").then(function(response){if(response.status<200||response.status>=300){throw Error("Fail to get restaurants");}return response.json();});};export var getCart=function getCart(){return fetch("/cart").then(function(response){if(response.status<200||response.status>=300){throw Error("Fail to get shopping cart data");}return response.json();});};export var checkout=function checkout(){return fetch("/checkout").then(function(response){if(response.status<200||response.status>=300){throw Error("Fail to checkout");}});};export var addItemToCart=function addItemToCart(itemId){return fetch("/order/".concat(itemId),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},credentials:"include"}).then(function(response){if(response.status<200||response.status>=300){throw Error("Fail to add menu item to shopping cart");}});};
